English: This is what I saw.
Chinese: 我看到了……
Korean: 보였어…
German: Dies habe ich gesehen.

English:
Destiny will guide you in defeating the Seven
Deadly Digimon.
Chinese: 你要遵從命運的指引，打倒七大魔王。
Korean: 운명이 이끄는 대로 7대 마왕을 쓰러뜨리는 거야
German:
Das Schicksal wird dir helfen, die Sieben
Dämonenkönige zu besiegen.

English:
It seems that one of the Seven Deadly Digimon
called Creepymon is at Central Hospital...
Chinese:
七大魔王之一的究極魔獸
似乎在「中央醫院」……
Korean:
7대 마왕 중 하나인 마왕몬은
「센트럴 병원」에 있는 것 같네…
German:
Creepymon, einer der Sieben Dämonenkönige, ist
im Zentralkrankenhaus ...

English:
It seems that one of the Seven Deadly Digimon
called Barbamon is in Nakano...
Chinese:
七大魔王之一的巴爾巴獸
似乎在「中野」……
Korean:
7대 마왕 중 하나인 발바몬은
「나카노」에 있는 것 같네…
German:
Barbamon, einer der Sieben Dämonenkönige, ist
in Nakano ...

English:
It seems that one of the Seven Deadly Digimon
called Lilithmon is in Nakano...
Chinese:
七大魔王之一的莉莉絲獸
似乎在「中野」……
Korean:
7대 마왕 중 하나인 리리스몬은
「나카노」에 있는 것 같네…
German:
Lilithmon, einer der Sieben Dämonenkönige, ist
in Nakano ...

English:
It seems that one of the Seven Deadly Digimon
called Leviamon is at Central Hospital...
Chinese:
七大魔王之一的利維坦獸
似乎在「中央醫院」……
Korean:
7대 마왕 중 하나인 리바이어몬은
「센트럴 병원」에 있는 것 같네…
German:
Leviamon, einer der Sieben Dämonenkönige, ist
im Zentralkrankenhaus ...

English:
It seems that one of the Seven Deadly Digimon
called Beelzemon is in Nakano...
Chinese:
七大魔王之一的墮天地獄獸
似乎在「中野」……
Korean:
7대 마왕 중 하나인 베르제브몬은
「나카노」에 있는 것 같네…
German:
Beelzemon, einer der Sieben Dämonenkönige, ist
in Nakano ...

English:
It seems that one of the Seven Deadly Digimon
called Belphemon is in Nakano...
Chinese:
七大魔王之一的貝爾菲獸
似乎在「中野」……
Korean:
7대 마왕 중 하나인 벨페몬은
「나카노」에 있는 것 같네…
German:
Belphemon, einer der Sieben Dämonenkönige, ist
in Nakano ...

English:
It seems that one of the Seven Deadly Digimon
called Lucemon is at Central Hospital...
Chinese:
七大魔王之一的光明獸
似乎在「中央醫院」……
Korean:
7대 마왕 중 하나인 루체몬은
「센트럴 병원」에 있는 것 같네…
German:
Lucemon, einer der Sieben Dämonenkönige, ist
im Zentralkrankenhaus ...

English: There is a Digital Space inside...
Chinese: 內部似乎有數碼空間……
Korean: 안쪽에 디지털 공간이 있는 것 같다…
German: Drinnen ist ein Digitalraum ...

English:
I defeated the Deadly Digimon known as Creepymon.
First off I should go and tell Mirei and Sayo...
Chinese:
打倒七大魔王之一的究極魔獸了……
先去向米蕾與小夜報告。
Korean:
7대 마왕 중 하나, 마왕몬을 쓰러뜨렸다…
우선 미레이와 사요에게 보고하자
German:
Ich habe den Dämonenkönig Creepymon besiegt.
Ich sollte zuerst Mirei und Sayo Bescheid sagen.

English:
I defeated the Deadly Digimon known as Barbamon.
First off I should go and tell Mirei and Sayo...
Chinese:
打倒七大魔王之一的巴爾巴獸了……
先去向米蕾與小夜報告。
Korean:
7대 마왕 중 하나, 발바몬을 쓰러뜨렸다…
우선 미레이와 사요에게 보고하자
German:
Ich habe den Dämonenkönig Barbamon besiegt.
Ich sollte zuerst Mirei und Sayo Bescheid sagen.

English:
I defeated the Deadly Digimon known as Lilithmon.
First off I should go and tell Mirei and Sayo...
Chinese:
打倒七大魔王之一的莉莉絲獸了……
先去向米蕾與小夜報告。
Korean:
7대 마왕 중 하나, 리리스몬을 쓰러뜨렸다…
우선 미레이와 사요에게 보고하자
German:
Ich habe den Dämonenkönig Lilithmon besiegt.
Ich sollte zuerst Mirei und Sayo Bescheid sagen.

English:
I defeated the Deadly Digimon known as Leviamon.
First off I should go and tell Mirei and Sayo...
Chinese:
打倒七大魔王之一的利維坦獸了……
先去向米蕾與小夜報告。
Korean:
7대 마왕 중 하나, 리바이어몬을 쓰러뜨렸다…
우선 미레이와 사요에게 보고하자
German:
Ich habe den Dämonenkönig Leviamon besiegt.
Ich sollte zuerst Mirei und Sayo Bescheid sagen.

English:
I defeated the Deadly Digimon known as Beelzemon.
First off I should go and tell Mirei and Sayo...
Chinese:
打倒七大魔王之一的墮天地獄獸了……
先去向米蕾與小夜報告。
Korean:
7대 마왕 중 하나, 베르제브몬을 쓰러뜨렸다…
우선 미레이와 사요에게 보고하자
German:
Ich habe den Dämonenkönig Beelzemon besiegt.
Ich sollte zuerst Mirei und Sayo Bescheid sagen.

English:
I defeated the Deadly Digimon known as Belphemon.
First off I should go and tell Mirei and Sayo...
Chinese:
打倒七大魔王之一的貝爾菲獸了……
先去向米蕾與小夜報告。
Korean:
7대 마왕 중 하나, 벨페몬을 쓰러뜨렸다…
우선 미레이와 사요에게 보고하자
German:
Ich habe den Dämonenkönig Belphemon besiegt.
Ich sollte zuerst Mirei und Sayo Bescheid sagen.

English:
I defeated the Deadly Digimon known as Lucemon.
First off I should go and tell Mirei and Sayo...
Chinese:
打倒七大魔王之一的光明獸了……
先去向米蕾與小夜報告。
Korean:
7대 마왕 중 하나, 루체몬을 쓰러뜨렸다…
우선 미레이와 사요에게 보고하자
German:
Ich habe den Dämonenkönig Lucemon besiegt.
Ich sollte zuerst Mirei und Sayo Bescheid sagen.

English:
Mwahaha... I will foretell for you the whereabouts
of the next of the Seven Deadly Digimon you need
to slay...
Chinese:
呵呵呵……我來占卜你下一個要打倒的
七大魔王所在之處。
Korean:
우후후… 네가 다음으로 쓰러뜨릴 7대 마왕이 있는 곳을
점쳐 줄게
German:
Muhaha ... Ich werde dir sagen, wo sich der
nächste der Sieben Dämonenkönige aufhält,
den du besiegen musst ...

English:
I am a champion of the Colosseum in the other
world.
Chinese:
我在另一邊的世界
可是競技場的冠軍哦。
Korean:
나, 건너편 세계에선
콜로세움의 챔피언이었어
German:
In der anderen Welt bin ein Champion des
Kolosseums.

English:
So, as a champion, and moreover, as someone who
has experience defeating the Seven Deadly Digimon,
I can give you battle tips to help out!
Chinese:
所以身為冠軍……
以及身為曾經打倒過七大魔王的過來人，
我可以告訴你一些戰鬥的要點！
Korean:
그러니까 챔피언으로서―…
그리고 한 번은 7대 마왕을 쓰러뜨린 경험자로서
배틀의 힌트를 알려줄 수는 있어!
German:
Als Champion und als jemand, der Erfahrung im
Besiegen der Sieben Dämonenkönige hat, kann
ich dir ein paar Kampftipps geben!

English:
When Creepymon gets angry his attack power goes
up, so you don't want to get him mad.
Chinese:
究極魔獸一生氣攻擊力就會增加，
所以不可以讓它太生氣。
Korean:
마왕몬은 화나면 공격력이 상승해
그러니까 너무 화나게 만들면 안 돼
German:
Wenn Creepymon wütend wird, werden seine Angriffe
mächtiger. Also verärgere ihn nicht.

English:
Huh? ...Yes, it is indeed difficult not to make
your enemy mad while trying to defeat him...
Chinese:
什麼？　……也是啦，
不要激怒要打倒的對手……可能是有點難。
Korean:
…어? …그야 쓰러뜨릴 상대를 화나지 않게… 하는 건
…어려울지도 모르지만
German:
Was? ... Ja, es ist schon schwierig, den Gegner
nicht wütend zu machen, wenn man versucht,
ihn zu besiegen ...

English: ...But hey, that's the job you signed up for!
Chinese: 真是的！　設法解決這個問題應該是你的工作吧！
Korean: …정말! 그걸 어떻게든 하는 게 네 일이잖아!
German:
... Aber das ist nun mal dein Job, du hast ihn dir
ausgesucht!

English:
I trust Mirei, so I suppose I'll trust you...
Not that you look all that trustworthy.
Chinese:
我相信米蕾小姐，所以才姑且也相信你的……
但是你看起來好像不怎麼可靠啊……
Korean:
미레이 씨를 신용하니까 너도 일단은 믿고 있지만…
너, 별로 믿음직스러워 보이지 않단 말이지…
German:
Ich vertraue Mirei, also vertraue ich wohl auch
dir ... Obwohl du gar nicht vertrauenswürdig
wirkst.

English: You would do well to heed my advice.
Chinese: 你最好把我的忠告聽進去喔。
Korean: 내 충고를 제대로 듣고 가는 게 좋을 거야
German: Du wärst gut beraten, meine Tipps zu befolgen.

English:
Barbamon starts off his attack strong, but...after
he expends his demonic power, he exposes a
weakness...
Chinese:
巴爾巴獸會施展強力的攻擊……
不過在它解放魔力後，會露出一點空隙。
Korean:
발바몬은 강력한 공격을 해오지만…
마력을 개방한 후 잠깐 틈이 생겨
German:
Barbamon beginnt mit einem starken Angriff, aber
wenn seine dämonische Kraft verbraucht ist,
zeigt er eine Schwäche ...

English:
Don't miss that chance. Strike as soon as you see
it!
Chinese: 不要放過這個機會，一舉進攻！
Korean: 그걸 놓치지 말고 일제히 공격!!
German:
Lass dir die Chance nicht entgehen. Schlag zu,
sobald du sie erkennst!

English:
...But don't get carried away or you'll pay for
it. What!? No...that never happened to me!
Chinese:
不過要是太得意忘形的話，小心吃到苦頭哦。
……我、我才沒有吃到什麼苦頭呢！
Korean:
………하지만 방심하다간 호되게 당할 거야
…따! 딱히 나는 당했던 적 없지만!
German:
... Aber übertreib es nicht, sonst wirst du dafür
zahlen. Was?! Nein ... Mir ist das nie passiert!

English: Hmm...Lilithmon...tips for fighting Lilithmon...
Chinese:
嗯～莉莉絲獸啊……
和莉莉絲獸戰鬥的要點……
Korean:
으음~, 리리스몬이라…
리리스몬전의 힌트…
German:
Hm ... Lilithmon. Tipps für den Kampf gegen
Lilithmon ...

English:
Lilithmon is quite fickle.
She changes her tactics a lot...
Chinese:
莉莉絲獸相當喜怒無常，
三不五時就會改變戰法……
Korean:
리리스몬은 엄청난 기분파지…
전법도 시시때때로 바꾸고…
German:
Lilithmon ist sehr unbeständig, sie ändert immer
wieder ihre Taktik ...

English:
You will have to do a lot of preparation in order
to deal with any tactics she might use.
Chinese:
你最好做足充分的準備
以對付它每一種戰法。
Korean:
어떤 전법이든 대응할 수 있도록
잘 준비해서 가는 편이 좋을 거야
German:
Du musst dich gut vorbereiten, um mit ihren
Taktiken fertig zu werden.

English: Did you restock all your items?
Chinese: 有好好補充道具嗎？
Korean: 아이템은 제대로 보충했어?
German: Hast du auch alles dabei, was du brauchst?

English:
This sucks... I'm a tamer too, but you've been
trusted with everything...
Chinese:
真不甘心……我明明也是馴獸師，
卻只能把一切都交給你……
Korean:
분하네… 나도 테이머인데
네게 전부 맡겨야만 하다니…
German:
Das ist gemein ... Ich bin auch ein Zähmer, aber
alles liegt in deinen Händen ...

English:
...Huh? My advice is going to be useful in the
battle?
Chinese: 什麼？　我的建議會在戰鬥中派上用場……？
Korean: ………뭐? 내 어드바이스가 배틀에 도움이 된다고…?
German:
... Was? Mein Rat wird für den Kampf nützlich
sein?

English:
What!? Of course!
I hardly need you to tell me that!
Chinese:
……那、那是當然的囉！
不用你說我也知道！
Korean:
………다, 당연하지!
네가 말하지 않아도 알고 있다고!
German:
Was?! Natürlich!
Das musst du mir nicht sagen!

English:
Next you need to go after Leviamon! His magic is
weak, but he can counterattack while you use
magic, so make sure you get your timing right!
Chinese:
接下來要去利維坦獸那邊對吧！
那傢伙雖然怕魔法，但還是會用魔法反擊，
你如果不注意時機的話會很慘哦！
Korean:
다음은 리바이어몬에게 가는 거지!
그 녀석은 마법엔 약하지만 마법 카운터도 사용하니까
타이밍을 신경 쓰지 않으면 큰일이 나!
German:
Als Nächstes ist Leviamon dran! Seine Magie ist
schwach, aber wenn du Magie nutzt, kann er einen
Gegenangriff starten, also achte auf dein Timing!

English:
...Hehe, you can't borrow the strength of a
champion to win this, so do your best!
Chinese:
嘿嘿嘿，借用冠軍的力量
怎麼可能會打不贏，你要加油哦！
Korean:
……에헤헤, 챔피언한테 힘을 빌렸는데
이기지 못할 리가 없으니까 힘내!
German:
... Hehe, die Stärke eines Champions kannst du
dir nicht ausleihen, um zu gewinnen.
Gib dein Bestes!

English:
I didn't know...that within the Seven Deadly
Digimon...such a thing existed...
Chinese:
我都不知道……
七大魔王的存在居然有這種機制……
Korean:
몰랐어…
7대 마왕의 존재가 그런 구조였다니…
German:
Ich wusste nicht, dass es ... bei den Sieben
Dämonenkönigen ... so etwas gibt ...

English:
Don't concern yourself with matters of the past.
There is nothing you can do about them. Now you
must focus only on the battle ahead!
Chinese:
對過去的事耿耿於懷也無濟於事，
現在必須專注在你的戰鬥上才行！
Korean:
…지난 일을 걱정해도 어쩔 수 없지
지금은 네 배틀에 집중해야 해!!
German:
Mach dir keine Sorgen wegen der Vergangenheit.
Du kannst sie nicht mehr ändern. Du musst dich
jetzt auf den bevorstehenden Kampf konzentrieren.

English:
Beelzemon is a short-tempered Digimon... Don't
drag the battle on for too long.
Chinese:
墮天地獄獸是隻個性火爆的數碼寶貝……
不可以把戰鬥拖太久。
Korean:
베르제브몬은 성격이 급한 디지몬이야
배틀을 너무 길게 끌면 안 돼
German:
Beelzemon ist ein übellauniges Digimon ...
Sorg dafür, dass der Kampf sich nicht zu lang
hinzieht.

English:
Do you have any power-type or speed-type Digimon?
You need to hit hard!
Chinese:
你有力量系、速度系的數碼寶貝嗎？
要用它們全力進攻才行！
Korean:
파워계나 스피드계인 디지몬 데리고 있어?
마구 공격해줘!
German:
Hast du Digimon vom Macht- oder Tempo-Typ?
Du musst richtig Schaden anrichten!

English:
In rage mode, Belphemon loses health and his ATK
increases.
Chinese:
貝爾菲獸的憤怒型態越是減弱，
攻擊力就越會上升。
Korean:
벨페몬의 레이지 모드는
약해지면 약해질수록 공격력이 높아져
German:
Wenn er wütend ist, verliert Belphemon Gesundheit,
aber seine ANG erhöht sich.

English:
In the final stage, you cannot hesitate. You must
rush him!
Chinese:
到了最後關頭時不可以膽怯，
要一鼓作氣對它追擊！
Korean:
마지막 총력을 쏟을 때엔 무섭다고 생각하게 해선 안 돼
단숨에 계속 몰아붙여!
German:
In der letzten Phase darfst du nicht zögern.
Du musst dich auf ihn stürzen!

English:
...Which reminds me, didn't Mirei say that, as a
punishment for defeating the Seven Deadly Digimon,
Dianamon was taken from her?
Chinese:
說到這個，米蕾小姐有提到過狄安娜獸
因為打倒七大魔王的“懲罰”而遭到刪除，對吧……？
Korean:
……그러고 보니 미레이 씨는 7대 마왕을 쓰러뜨린 "벌"로
디아나몬이 없어졌다고 했잖아…?
German:
... Da fällt mir ein, meinte Mirei nicht, dass sie
Dianamon verloren hat? Zur Strafe, weil sie
die Sieben Dämonenkönige besiegt hat?

English:
So...if you beat the Seven Deadly Digimon of this
world...
Chinese: 那麼……打倒這個世界的七大魔王……
Korean: 그럼… 이 세계의 7대 마왕을 쓰러뜨리면…
German:
Wenn du also die Sieben Dämonenkönige in dieser
Welt besiegst ...

English: What will happen?
Chinese: 又會發生什麼事情呢……？
Korean: 어떻게 되는 걸까…?
German: Was geschieht dann?

English:
Lucemon can use "knockback" (forced substitution),
so you should make sure you don't have any other
Digimon in reserve...
Chinese:
光明獸會使用擊退（強制替換），
所以最好把場下的數碼寶貝清空再去挑戰它……
Korean:
루체몬은 넉백(강제 교체)을 쓰니까
리저브 디지몬은 비워둔 채로 도전하는 게 좋을지도…
German:
Lucemon kann „Rückschlag“ (einen erzwungenen
Austausch) einsetzen. Achte also drauf, dass
du keine Digimon in Reserve hast ...

English:
Did you know this? If you don't have any other
Digimon, he can't use knockback.
Chinese:
你懂嗎？　只要場下沒有數碼寶貝
就不會引發擊退。
Korean:
알고 있어? 리저브 디지몬이 없으면
넉백은 일어나지 않아
German:
Wusstest du das? Wenn du keine anderen Digimon
hast, kann er „Rückschlag“ nicht benutzen.

English:
It's a bit nerve-wracking not to have any other
back-up Digimon but, maybe you can just select
your best three? You'll have to trust in them...
Chinese:
沒有交替的數碼寶貝你可能會很擔心，
不過那三隻是你選出來的最強數碼寶貝吧？　你要信賴它們才行。
Korean:
교체할 디지몬이 없어서 걱정될지도 모르지만
네가 고른 베스트 3마리잖아? 신뢰해 줘야지
German:
Es ist schon nervenaufreibend, keine weiteren
Digimon zu haben, aber kannst du deine besten
drei auswählen? Du musst ihnen vertrauen ...

English:
This battle with Lucemon will be long and
bitter... You mustn't give up!
Chinese:
與光明獸的戰鬥會形成一場長期戰……
直到最後你都不可以放棄……！
Korean:
루체몬은 장기전이 될 거야…
마지막까지 포기하면 안 돼…!
German:
Dieser Kampf gegen Lucemon wird lang und
unerbittlich ... Du darfst nicht aufgeben!

English:
...Don't misunderstand me here, this doesn't mean
I approve of you.
Chinese:
……你不要搞錯了，
我可沒有認同你。
Korean:
…착각하지 말아줘
난 너를 인정한 게 아니니까
German:
... Versteh mich nicht falsch. Das bedeutet nicht,
dass ich dich in Ordnung finde.

English:
In any case, once you've won the battle, Dianamon
will be returned.
Chinese: 總之這麼一來……狄安娜獸就會回來了吧？
Korean: 아무튼 이제… 디아나몬이 돌아오는 거지?
German:
Wie dem auch sei, wenn du dann den Kampf gewonnen
hast, kehrt Dianamon zurück.

English:
So I am asking you to do this...but this still
doesn't mean I approve of you!
Chinese:
就照這個樣子麻煩你了。
……我、我可沒有認同你哦。
Korean:
그 기세로 잘 부탁해
…따, 딱히 널 인정한 건 아니지만
German:
Ich bitte dich also darum, aber das heißt dennoch
nicht, dass ich dich in Ordnung finde!

English:
Once you've defeated the Seven Deadly Digimon, my
partner Dianamon will finally be returned to me...
Chinese:
只要把七大魔王全部打倒，
就可以奪回我的搭檔狄安娜獸……
Korean:
7대 마왕을 전부 쓰러뜨리면, 내 파트너
디아나몬을 되찾을 수 있어…
German:
Wenn du die Sieben Dämonenkönige besiegt hast,
wird mein Partner Dianamon endlich zu mir
zurückkehren ...
